snippet.title: Noun Town Language Learning - Official Gameplay Overview | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description: Learn about Noun Town Language Learning in this gameplay overview for the upcoming game that teaches you a new way to learn a foreign language, including Japanese, Korean, Spanish, and more. In Noun Town Language Learning, interact, listen, read, and speak your chosen language in a world that regains color as you learn. est your skills with mini-games & talk to the local villagers. Noun Town Language Learning will be available on Steam summer of 2023, with console versions available later in 2023.
